typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TechnicalPolicy as string,
		ActionFamily as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadCreateTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamilies
ReadCreateTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamilies select(mapColumn(
		{$sourceId} = TechnicalPolicy,
		{$targetId} = ActionFamily),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IdSelection
IdSelection derive({$relationshipName} = 'contains_Action1',
	{$relationshipDelete} = 'false',
	{$relationshipId} = {$sourceId} + 'to' + {$targetId}) ~> ModelDefinition
ModelDefinition sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['tmp_TechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamilies.v1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteToTempRepo
source(output(
		TechnicalPolicy as string,
		ActionFamily as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadCreateTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamilies select(mapColumn(
		TechnicalPolicy,
		ActionFamily),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor union(byName: true)~> StatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor
StatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamilies_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateTechnicalPoliciesMainActionFamiliesStatusEditor
